channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 dead and 10 wounded in shooting at banquet hall in Stockton, California
item.description: Four people were killed and 10 wounded in a shooting during a family gathering at a banquet hall in Stockton, sheriff's officials said Saturday.

item.title: Suspect in National Guard attack struggled with ‘dark isolation’ as community raised concerns
item.description: The Afghan man accused of gunning down two National Guard members blocks from the White House last week had been unraveling for years.

item.title: Acclaimed playwright Tom Stoppard dies at 88
item.description: Tom Stoppard is remembered as a playwright whose wit and curiosity reshaped modern theater.

item.title: Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
New York state law takes aim at personalized pricing
item.description: Businesses that use personalized pricing are now required to tell customers, “This price was set by an algorithm using your personal data."

item.title: No, you can’t get your AI to ‘admit’ to being sexist, but it probably is anyway
item.description: Though LLMs might not use explicitly biased language, they may infer your demographic data and display implicit biases, researchers say.
